posts.description:
Working from home has its positives and negatives. Mostly I love it, but one of the biggest challenges is splitting up work and home time.
.
I find the best way to do it is by creating an evening ritual; an activity that takes me from office to home. Sometimes a bubble bath, sometimes a glass of wine, but currently it's tea!
.
I brew a pot and take twenty minutes to sit and relax (probably distracted by my phone!) before planning what's for supper or taking the dogs out.
.
What's your evening ritual? Oh and don't forget you can still use my @danielwellington discount code to get 15% for another few weeks LAURABUTLERMADDEN #danielwellington #dwclassicpetite #rosegoldwatch #rosegold #sp #daffodils #tea #teapot #burleighpottery #teatime #timefortea #tealover

Back in Dorset this morning and it's the most beautiful day!
.
Happy Tuesday all üòç‚òÄÔ∏è‚ú®
.
#dorset #dorsetlandscape #dorsetviews #dorsetlove #beautifuldordogne #dorsetlife #dorsetliving #countrylife #countrygirl

Enjoying exploring our new London neighbourhood - so many pretty pastel houses in #nottinghill ‚ú®
.
You can check out our progress on the flat in my stories. We're almost there now, just need to add all the finishing touches!
.
#prettypastels #prettypastelhouses #londoner #nottinghillhouses #prettycitylondon #prettycities #prettycitiesofinstagram #flatrenovation #lbmrenovation

I think it's a little unfair that #wisteria gets all the histeria when this beautiful flower is also currently in bloom and so, so pretty!
.
So let's hear it for #ceanothus which is also brightening our days at the moment. Such a beauty!
.
Happy weekend! We're off to the first wedding of the season today, I hope you have something lovely planned too.

So we've made it through the (shortened) week to Friday! It's a bit chilly in Dorset this morning, so I'm day dreaming of being back in Malibu for breakfast on the pier at sunrise. It was heaven!
.
Have a fab Friday and don't forget to spend some time daydreaming! Oh and if you have time check out my blog post - 24 hours in Malibu, link in profile.
.
#dreamallday #malibudreaming #fridayfeeling #elevatetheeveryday #celebratetheeverday #everydaymoments #rottenroach

If you fancy some of this beautiful Malibu sunshine then head over to the blog for my 24 hours in Malibu Beach. I couldn't believe how beautiful and bright it was there, so sunny and glossy, so LA! 
Link to post in bio #throwback #tbt #malibumoments #malibufarm #malibubeach #malibupier #lamoments

This morning I'm joining in with the #wisteriahysteria - spotted in Sherborne on Monday, such a pretty house! Have a lovely day all.
.
.
Oh and on stories this evening I'll be sharing a tour of our garden, very much work in progress. Make sure you check it out!
.
.
wisteriahaze #wisteriaflowers #elevatetheeveryday #flowers #sherborne #dorset #dorsetlife #beautifuldorset

Having been excited to get back to work after a lovely, relaxing, long weekend, I woke up this morning feeling really rotten with a painful very sore throat!
.
.
So today has been mainly like this; I caught up on emails in bed this morning, made it to the sofa this afternoon and am now settling down to a box set Netflix (Riverdale, has anyone seen it?!). Not what I'd planned for today, but sometimes you just have to stop and sit still for a while! .
.
#springday #springflowers #springflowersmakemehappy #daffodilsinbloom #daffodils #EverydayWhimsy #HazyShadesOfSpring
#OfQuietMoments #elevatetheeveryday #everydaywonders #natureinthehome #stylingtheseasons

What a gorgeous Easter weekend - an amazing supper @summerlodge (I can't recommend the tasting menu enough) followed by sunshine, country walks and an Easter egg hunt in the beautiful bluebell woods.
.
.
Roast lamb and too much wine, movie night and to finish off today a potter in Poundbury (admiring the lovely architecture by the talented @benpentreath) and a hearty chicken pie that had a little too much sauce, so has been renamed 'chicken swamp' pie. .
.
A gorgeous happy time, now to relax with one last glass of wine and a magazine (oh and some chocolate of course!) What did you get up to this weekend? ‚ú®ü•Çüê£ü•Ç‚ú®
.
#easterweekend #loveofcountryhouses #littlestoriesofmylife #momentsofmine #elevatingtheeveryday #homelove #figtree
Our own little blossom tree is at last planted in the garden! Happy Easter all, I'm taking a few days out from social media to enjoy the weekend. Have a fabulous time! ‚ú®ü•Çüê£
